name: Beseech
description:
Your god has come and they are angry.

Your humble monastery is the only thing standing before inevitable doom at the hands of a wrathful god. Perform tasks around the monastery and worship to appeal to god. But beware! Your god is a fickle one, and at any given time, certain things might anger them or please them more than usual. Can you interpret your god's desires well enough to stave off certain destruction for a few more precious hours?

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/beseech
